Instruction: Downloading data for the city from NSRDB? (yes or no) if yes, please, fill rows 15 to 28. The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.

Generating scenarios based on the probability distributions? (yes or no) if yes, please, fill row 32 to 34.  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.

Scneario reduction using k-medoid and PCA? (yes or no) if yes, please, fill rows  33 and 34. The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.

Finding the optimum number of features in Principal component analysis (PCA)? (yes or no) if yes, row 7, 'Perfrom scenario reduction' must be yes.  if yes, a figure that can help to fill row 33 will be generated in the directory. The yes/no question is case sensitive. Finding the optimum number of clusters in k-medoid? (yes or no) if yes, a figure that can help to fill row 34 will be generated in the directory. if yes, row 7, 'Perfrom scenario reduction' must be yes.  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.

Perfroming the two-stage SP optimization using NSGA-II and CPLEX solver? (yes or no) if yes, please, fill rows 38 to 56.  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.

Generating the plot  from two-stage stochastic programming results? (yes or no) if yes,  Pareto front and parallel coordinates figures are generated in the results folder.  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.

Optimum number of clusters. This number +2 gives the number of representative days that will be optimized to minimze cost and emissions.
city's electricity generation emission factor  (lbs/MWh). For U.S. case studies, you can find the electricity generation emission factors at state level here: https://www.eia.gov/electricity/state/'
What percentage of city's electricity emission factor should be used? For example,  0.7  value means electricity generation emission factor = city EF * 0.7

UPV factor for finding the present value of future single costs of maintenance: You can find the values for different lifespan of projects and discount rate here on Page 9: https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/ir/2019/NIST.IR.85-3273-34.pdf

UPV factors for finding the present value of future single costs of natural gas: You can find the values for different states, lifespan of projects, and discount rate here on Page 21: https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/ir/2019/NIST.IR.85-3273-34.pdf

UPV factors for finding the present value of future single costs of electricity: You can find the values for different states, lifespan of projects, and discount rate here on Page 21: https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/ir/2019/NIST.IR.85-3273-34.pdf
Area of each commercial PV moduel (m^2)
Total available rooftop area (m^2) to instal solar PV systems
Population size for the NSGA-II, recommended value is 50
Number of iterations for the NSGA-II, recommended value depends on population size, if population size is 50, a good number of iteration is 2000
Number of processor to use in the NSGA-II, depend on the working PC/laptop, 5 is a good number for a PC/laptop with four cores.

Do we use boilers in the district energy system?  (yes or no) Please, set "Boiler" as yes if you haven't added another component to provide heat.  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.

Do we use the grid in the district energy system?  (yes or no) Please. Leave it as 'yes' if you do not want to analyze a stand alone system.  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.
Do we use CHP in the district energy system?   (yes or no).  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.
Do we use solar PV in the district energy system?   (yes or no).  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.
Do we use wind turbines in the district energy system?   (yes or no).  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.
Do we use batteries in the district energy system?   (yes or no).  The yes/no question is case sensitive. Please, make sure 'yes' is written without a space or capital letter.
